Class JobDefinitionHelper

  • java.lang.Object

public class JobDefinitionHelper
extends Object
    A helper class for StorageFile related code.

      • maskPassword

        public void maskPassword(Parameter parameter)
        Masks the value of the given parameter if the parameter is a password. If the parameter has the name which contains the string "password" case-insensitive, the value will be replaced with ****.
        Parameters:
        parameter - Parameter to mask
